

## accept

Accepts an estimates

```shell
curl -X PATCH \
  
    -H 'accept: application/vnd.api+json' \
    -H 'content-type: application/vnd.api+json' \
    -H 'authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..vQvGeDRW9hdp6s_-0xcdmApyaR2q4XPXGuAjJYwGEjU' \
  "https://api.zipbooks.com/v2/estimates/41/accept"
```

> Example Response:

```json
""
```

### HTTP Request

`PATCH https://api.zipbooks.com/v2/estimates/41/accept`
